verses.verse: Brethren, <S%G80><s%> my heart's desire <S%G2107><s%> and my prayer <S%G1162><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for them is for [their] salvation. <S%G4991><s%>
For I bear <S%G3140><s%> them witness <S%G3140><s%> that they have <S%G2192><s%> a zeal <S%G2205><s%> for God, <S%G2316><s%> but not in accordance <S%G2596><s%> with knowledge. <S%G1922><s%>

For not knowing <S%G50><s%> about God <S%G2316><s%>'s righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and seeking <S%G2212><s%> to establish <S%G2476><s%> their own, <S%G2398><s%> they did not subject <S%G5293><s%> themselves to the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God.
For Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the end <S%G5056><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> for righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who believes. <S%G4100><s%>

For Moses <S%G3475><s%> writes <S%G1125><s%> that the man <S%G444><s%> who practices <S%G4160><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is based <S%G1537><s%> on law <S%G3551><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by that righteousness. <S%G846><s%>

But the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> based <S%G1537><s%> on faith <S%G4102><s%> speaks <S%G3004><s%> thus, <S%G3779><s%> "Do not say <S%G3004><s%> in your heart, <S%G2588><s%> 'Who <S%G5101><s%> will ascend <S%G305><s%> into heaven <S%G3772><s%>?' (that is, to bring <S%G2609><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> down <S%G2609><s%>),
or <S%G2228><s%> 'Who <S%G5101><s%> will descend <S%G2597><s%> into the abyss <S%G12><s%>?' (that is, to bring <S%G321><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> up from the dead <S%G3498><s%>). "

But what <S%G5101><s%> does it say <S%G3004><s%>? "The word <S%G4487><s%> is near <S%G1451><s%> you, in your mouth <S%G4750><s%> and in your heart <S%G2588><s%>" â€“ that is, the word <S%G4487><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we are preaching, <S%G2784><s%>

that if <S%G1437><s%> you confess <S%G3670><s%> with your mouth <S%G4750><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> [as] Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and believe <S%G4100><s%> in your heart <S%G2588><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> Him from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> you shall be saved; <S%G4982><s%>

for with the heart <S%G2588><s%> man believes, <S%G4100><s%> resulting <S%G1519><s%> in righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and with the mouth <S%G4750><s%> he confesses, <S%G3670><s%> resulting <S%G1519><s%> in salvation. <S%G4991><s%>
For the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Whoever <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> in Him will not be disappointed. <S%G2617><s%>"

For there is no <S%G3756><s%> distinction <S%G1293><s%> between Jew <S%G2453><s%> and Greek; <S%G1672><s%> for the same <S%G846><s%> [Lord <S%G2962><s%>] is Lord of all, <S%G3956><s%> abounding <S%G4147><s%> in riches <S%G4147><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> who call <S%G1941><s%> upon Him;
for "Whoever <S%G3956><s%> will call <S%G1941><s%> upon the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will be saved. <S%G4982><s%>"

How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall they call <S%G1941><s%> upon Him in whom <S%G3739><s%> they have not believed <S%G4100><s%>? And how <S%G4459><s%> shall they believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him whom <S%G3739><s%> they have not heard <S%G191><s%>? And how <S%G4459><s%> shall they hear <S%G191><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> a preacher <S%G2784><s%>?

And how <S%G4459><s%> shall they preach <S%G2784><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they are sent <S%G649><s%>? Just <S%G2509><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "How <S%G5613><s%> beautiful <S%G5611><s%> are the feet <S%G4228><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who bring <S%G2097><s%> glad <S%G2097><s%> tidings <S%G2097><s%> of good <S%G18><s%> things! <S%G18><s%>"

However, <S%G235><s%> they did not all <S%G3956><s%> heed <S%G5219><s%> the glad <S%G2098><s%> tidings; <S%G2098><s%> for Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has believed <S%G4100><s%> our report <S%G189><s%>? "
So <S%G686><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> [comes] from hearing, <S%G189><s%> and hearing <S%G189><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But I say, <S%G3004><s%> surely <S%G3361><s%> they have never <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3756><s%> heard, <S%G191><s%> have they? Indeed <S%G3304><s%> they have; "Their voice <S%G5353><s%> has gone <S%G1831><s%> out into all <S%G3956><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> And their words <S%G4487><s%> to the ends <S%G4009><s%> of the world. <S%G3625><s%>"

But I say, <S%G3004><s%> surely <S%G3361><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> did not know, <S%G1097><s%> did they? At the first <S%G4413><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "I will make <S%G3863><s%> you jealous <S%G3863><s%> by that which is not a nation, <S%G1484><s%> By a nation <S%G1484><s%> without <S%G801><s%> understanding <S%G801><s%> will I anger <S%G3949><s%> you."

And Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> is very <S%G662><s%> bold <S%G662><s%> and says, <S%G3004><s%> "I was found <S%G2147><s%> by those <S%G3588><s%> who sought <S%G2212><s%> Me not, I became <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G1717><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who did not ask <S%G1905><s%> for Me."

But as for Israel <S%G2474><s%> He says, <S%G3004><s%> "All <S%G3650><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> long I have stretched <S%G1600><s%> out My hands <S%G5495><s%> to a disobedient <S%G544><s%> and obstinate <S%G483><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>"
